name: > keep typing!
description:
This is a typing quest, you have to read more than type, analyze and figure out what is going on. Actually, this game is more about cogitations than about typing :) In the end, you have to make a decision. There are two ends of the game. 

 It was created for LudumDare 46, there was a theme "Keep it alive".  For now it is just an idea, I'm going to finish this game polish all mechanics and add more.
